        <value>var strLog = '';
function Log(strText)
{
	strLog = strLog + "\n" + strText;
}
(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual)
{
	var bResult = true;
	
	
	function AddGroup(strName)
	{
		gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
		gr.initialize(); 
		gr.name = '_ATF_DATASILOS_'+strName;
		var strSysId = gr.insert();
		Log('AddGroup('+strName+') returns '+strSysId);
		return strSysId;
	}
	
	function AddUser(strName, aRoles, aGroups)
	{
		gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		gr.initialize(); 
		gr.surname = '_ATF_DATASILOS';
		gr.lastname = strName;
		if (Array.isArray(aRoles))
		{
			var strRoles = aRoles.join(',');
			gr.roles = strRoles;
		}
		var strSysId = gr.insert();
		Log('AddUser('+strName+') returns '+strSysId);
		return strSysId;
	}

/*
	function TestCase_QueryIncidents(vInput, vExpected)
	{
		Log('TestCase_FunctionXXX');
		Log('Input: '+vInput);
		Log('Expected: '+vExpected);
		var vResult = FunctionXXX(vInput);
		Log('Result  : '+vResult);
		if (vResult != vExpected)
		{
			bResult = false;
			Log('Test case FAILED');
		}
		Log('');
	}
*/

	var strGroupA = AddGroup('A');
	var strGroupB = AddGroup('B');
	var strGroupC = AddGroup('B');

	var strUserA = AddUser('A',['itil'],['A']);
	var strUserB = AddUser('B',['itil'],['B']);
	var strUserC = AddUser('B',['itil'],['C']);

	
	
	
	
	
		
	stepResult.setOutputMessage(strLog);
	return bResult;
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);</value>
        <variable display_value="">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable>
    </sys_variable_value>
